**Alfred Molina** (born **Alfredo Molina**; 24 May 1953) is an English actor and voice artist known for his work on the stage and screen. He first rose to prominence in the [End](West)(West End theatre), earning a nomination for the [Olivier Award for Best Newcomer in a Play](Laurence)(Laurence Olivier Award for Best Newcomer in a Play) for his performance in the production of *[Oklahoma!](Oklahoma!)* in 1980. He made his film debut as [Satipo](List of Indiana Jones characters#Satipo) in *[of the Lost Ark](Raiders)(Raiders of the Lost Ark)* and his [Broadway](Broadway theatre) debut as Yvan in a production of *[Art](Art (play))* from 1998 to 1999. His other Broadway roles include [Tevye](Tevye) in the musical *[on the Roof](Fiddler)(Fiddler on the Roof)* from 2004 to 2005 and [Rothko](Mark)(Mark Rothko) in the play *[Red](Red (play))* from 2009 to 2010.

On screen, his best known roles include [Halliwell](Kenneth)(Kenneth Halliwell) in *[Up Your Ears](Prick)(Prick Up Your Ears)* (1987), [Bozorg Mahmoody](Sayyed)(Sayyed Bozorg Mahmoody) in *[Without My Daughter](Not)(Not Without My Daughter (film))*, (1991), Mellersh Wilkins in *[April](Enchanted)(Enchanted April (1991 film))* (1992), Rahad Jackson in *[Nights](Boogie)(Boogie Nights)* (1997), Comte de Reynaud in *[Chocolat](Chocolat (2000 film))* (2000), [Rivera](Diego)(Diego Rivera) in *[Frida](Frida (film))* (2002), [Tetzel](Johann)(Johann Tetzel) in *[Luther](Luther (2003 film))* (2003), Bishop Aringarosa in *[Da Vinci Code](The)(The Da Vinci Code (film))* (2006), Jack Mellor in *[Education](An)(An Education)* (2009), and George in *[Is Strange](Love)(Love Is Strange (film))* (2014). He has voiced characters in *[Rango](Rango (2011 film))* (2011), *[University](Monsters)(Monsters University)* (2013), *[Race to the Edge](Dragons:)(Dragons: Race to the Edge)* (2016), *[Breaks the Internet](Ralph)(Ralph Breaks the Internet)* (2018), *[II](Frozen)(Frozen II)* (2019), and *[League of Super-Pets](DC)(DC League of Super-Pets)* (2022). He is also known for his portrayal of [Octavius / Doctor Octopus](Otto)(Otto Octavius (film character)) in [Raimi](Sam)(Sam Raimi)'s *[2](Spider-Man)(Spider-Man 2)* (2004) and the [Cinematic Universe](Marvel)(Marvel Cinematic Universe) film *[No Way Home](Spider-Man:)(Spider-Man: No Way Home)* (2021).

Molina's work has brought him widespread acclaim. For his portrayal of [Aldrich](Robert)(Robert Aldrich) in the miniseries *[Feud](Feud (TV series))* (2017), he was nominated for a [Globe Award](Golden)(Golden Globe Award) and a [Emmy Award](Primetime)(Primetime Emmy Award). He received a [Award](BAFTA)(BAFTA Award) nomination for [Supporting Actor](Best)(BAFTA Award for Best Supporting Actor) for his performance in *Frida*, and has also been nominated for an [Spirit Award](Independent)(Independent Spirit Award), a [Independent Film Award](British)(British Independent Film Award), five [Actors Guild Award](Screen)(Screen Actors Guild Award)s, and three [Awards](Tony)(Tony Awards).
